story: Ahmed Raslan shared Nilecode's photo to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Nilecode
description:
We are looking for a talented UI Designer to create amazing user experiences. 

Responsibilities:-

-Collaborate with management and design team to define and implement innovative solutions for the product direction, visuals and experience.

-Execute all visual design stages from concept to final hand-off to engineering.

-Create wireframes, storyboards, user flows, process flows and site maps to effectively communicate interaction and design ideas

Requirements:-

-2+ years of UI experience.
-Demonstrable UI design skills with a strong portfolio.
-Up-to-date with the latest UI trends,and techniques.
-Ability to present your designs and sell your solutions to various stakeholders.
-Ability to solve problems creatively and effectively.

If you love what you do, and want a place where you can shine
send your CV & Portfolio to <jobs@nilecode.com> with the code "UI-D-007" in the subject
